OOC: I think I forgot to tell anyone I was leaving last week...  Oh well...

::Aerotaur::
    He stands motionless watching the battle.  He witnesses Sarge's death and 
the arrival of the Vile Force.  He sees Gemini Dragon.  He sees Radistor 
form.  He does not move.  His mind is filled with hatred.  His thoughts cloud 
as he decides to go after Radistor where he believes Deemos is.  He takes 
flight and in midair separates the two halves of his bladed staff.  He tries 
to drive the energy blades into Radistor's back.
